text: Pioneertown, California, is an unincorporated community of the Morongo Basin region of San Bernardino's High Desert in California, United States. , Pioneertown had a population of 350.http://www.carehelp.org/files/News/20060918_Pioneertown_Is_Ersatz_Its_Compassion_Is_Real.pdf In July 2006, parts of Pioneertown were burned in the Sawtooth Complex fire, which also burned into Yucca Valley and Morongo Valley. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Pioneertown, USA: The Definitive History of Pioneertown, CA.. Where the Old West Lives Again!" MARCH of 2o18 / Paperback / 3o8 Pages "PIONEERTOWN, USA" Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Settlements in San Bernardino County, California
title: Pioneertown, California
